lead_paragraph: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver said Tuesday that returning the All-Star Game to Charlotte in 2019 is "a high priority," provided there's a resolution to a North Carolina law that restricts the rights of LGBT people.

headline.main: Silver: NBA All-Star Game in Charlotte in 2019 'a Priority'
headline.print_headline: Silver: NBA All-Star Game in Charlotte in 2019 'a Priority'

snippet: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver said Tuesday that returning the All-Star Game to Charlotte in 2019 is "a high priority," provided there's a resolution to a North Carolina law that restricts the rights of LGBT people....
